Title: Women in Tech SEO Festival Returns to Philadelphia
Description: The Women in Tech SEO Festival is returning to Philadelphia on September 19th, 2024.

Title: Microsoft Recommends Using Bing to Improve PC Performance
Description: Microsoft's PC Manager tool suggests switching to Bing as the default search engine to enhance Windows performance.

Title: Google Introduces Two New Web Crawlers
Description: Google has unveiled two new web crawlers: GoogleOther-Image and GoogleOther-Video.

Title: EU Demands Information from Microsoft Regarding Bing's AI Features
Description: The European Commission has requested Microsoft to provide details about the risks associated with generative AI in Bing's search engine.

Title: TikTok Tests 60-Minute Video Uploads
Description: TikTok is currently experimenting with allowing users to upload videos up to 60 minutes in length.

Title: Order with Google Integration to End in June
Description: Google's 'Order with Google' integration will be discontinued at the end of June.

Title: Google Support Thread Regarding Image Thumbnails Locked Down
Description: Google has restricted access to a support thread where users reported issues with image thumbnails not appearing in search results.

Title: Mikhail Parakhin Joins Perplexity Advisory Board
Description: Mikhail Parakhin, a prominent figure in the search industry, has joined the advisory board of Perplexity AI.
